Name: Evon Young (Yung LT)
Description:
Young, a trans man and rapper, was taken by several men to a basement, choked him with a chain and taped a plastic bag over his head and beat him with tools until he died. Police suspects a gang homicide.

TvT project: Twin Cities 23.01.2013

Name: Cemia Dove Acoff ("Ce Ce")
Description:
Ce Ce was stabbed repeatedly by Andrey Bridges, 36, on or around 5th January 2013. Her body was found naked from the waist down floating in his pond on 17th April.

> Cleveland, January 2013 and 20-year-old Cemia “Ce Ce” Dove went out in the morning and was never seen alive again.
> 
> The same day two men called on local man Andrew Bridges looking for rent he owed. They noticed there was blood splattered in the house, a bonfire burning in the back yard and his hand was bleeding badly.
> 
> However, it was three months before police found Dove’s body in Bridges’s pond. She’d been stabbed 40 times and her body weighted with a lump of concrete.
> 
> 36-year-old Bridges had called Dove in the morning of the murder and paid $100 for a cab to bring her up to his house.
> 
> Exactly what happened is unknown but detectives think that when Bridges found out that Dove was [a trans woman], he became very angry and killed her.

Bridges was found guilty in November of the same year and sentenced to life in prison.

> “Justice was done,” said the victim’s mother, Martha Acoff. “My [daughter] is with me in spirit. Andrey Bridges is going to get what he deserves. He’s going to have to ask God for His forgiveness. I forgive him.”

TvT project: Cleveland.com, 29.04.2013 & Newsnet 5 10.05.13

https://transgriot.blogspot.com/2013/11/andrey-bridges-sentenced-in-cemia-dove.html

Name: Nicole Galisteu (Bruno Borges Generoso)
Description:
The victim went to a night club with four young man, kissing one of them. After they realized that the victim was a trans person, they killed her. Police has arrested three suspects of the transphobic murder.

TvT project: TvT partner organization Grupo Gay da Bahia & CGN 08.01.2013

Name: Tiffany (Wesly) Holder
Description:
The victim was a sex worker and was murdered by three men. The police arrested three suspects. A relative said that the victim knew her murderes and that they had sex with her, before murdering her. Activists from the NGO Society Against Sexual Orientation Discrimination (SASOD) noted that  violence against transgender sex workers is way too common in Guyana, underscoring that many incidents go unreported because the victims fear that no action will be taken against the perpetrators  and added “laws which criminalise crossH dressing and sameHsex intimacy provide institutional validation for the prejudices which fuel violence against sexual and gender minorities.”

TvT project: Guyana Chronicle Online, 13.01.2013 & Guyana Times 14.01.2013
